title: Images
creator_credit: Robert Altman, Tommy Thompson, Lions Gate Films and Hemdale Film Corporation
brief_description: Neglected by her husband, an emotionally disturbed woman locks herself away in a world of fantasy. Unable to completely escape reality, her brave attempts to maintain composure ultimately crash with frightening violence. A tense and thrilling drama. Stars Susannah York, Rene Auberjonois, Marcel Bozzuffi, Hugh Millais, Cathryn Harrison.
